attributes.action: Have a Nationwide Enquiry into all aspects of Rape Gangs
attributes.additional_details: For the safety of all UK children
attributes.background: We need to find out who committed the crimes and also those that stood by and allowed it to happen.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
